title: account recovery
body:
I submitted two account recoveries as I lost email access to the email linked to my account. In one email, i put the wrong email address in the part that says “Your email”. I want that ticket to be deleted since my other ticket has the email i would like support to email me back with 

Can a player support member help me? I’ll tell you which email it is

replies.body: We can certainly disregard that ticket if you want. Go ahead and reply in that ticket, and just let us know that it was the wrong info. If you want you can go ahead and shoot me that ticket number and I'll hop on it and leave a comment myself ^_^

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=KTxt54wg,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-01-31T23:25:22.640+0000)
>
> We can certainly disregard that ticket if you want. Go ahead and reply in that ticket, and just let us know that it was the wrong info. If you want you can go ahead and shoot me that ticket number and I'll hop on it and leave a comment myself ^_^

I read that account recoveries don't show up in the "My tickets" page so I can't actually view the ticket ID :/
I added you on league so it's easier to respond

I don't believe they will since you're technically not signed in for those, sorry about that. Feel free to just ignore that ticket when they reply, no biggie there. Or you can still give me the ticket # and I'll make a note for the agents ^_^
The account was just banned for error code 2100, which I believe is related to account security...? Is thisnormal when doing the account recovery? I have access to the account just not the email...
Yup that's an account security related code. Did you want to shoot me that ticket # so I could pull it up?
I don't have any ticket # because I did the account recovery and I haven't gotten a response yet

Ah, thought you might have had a response in your email by now possibly. No worries, they'll respond to that ticket and you can just ignore it. Won't be a problem. Just respond to whichever ticket you'd like to continue working in whenever you get a response.
